mapper.select: SELECT TP.PERMISSIONID ID,TP.NAME NAME,TP.PID PID, CASE WHEN TP2.ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'TRUE' WHEN TP2.ID IS NULL THEN 'FALSE' END CHECKED, CASE WHEN TP.PID IS NULL THEN 'TRUE' WHEN TP.PID IS NOT NULL THEN 'FASLE' END OPEN FROM T_PERMISSION TP LEFT JOIN( SELECT TP.PERMISSIONID ID,TP.NAME NAME,TP.PID PID FROM T_ROLE_PERMISSION TRP LEFT JOIN T_PERMISSION TP ON TRP.PERMISSIONID = TP.PERMISSIONID WHERE TRP.ROLEID = #{ROLEID}) TP2 ON TP.PERMISSIONID = TP2.ID WHERE TP.`STATUS` = 1
SELECT TP.* FROM T_USER_ROLE TUR, T_ROLE_PERMISSION TRP, T_PERMISSION TP WHERE TUR.ROLEID = TRP.ROLEID AND TRP.PERMISSIONID = TP.PERMISSIONID AND TUR.USERID = #{id} AND TP.TYPE != 2
